column2: "Ooh, nice killing out there. Oh, and Lisa saw your report. A blood-soaked thing of beauty it was!"
"Your run-and-gun style and magazine swap outs were picture-perfect! Just how a rifle's supposed to be used!"
"Anyway, that rifle seems to fit your hands like a glove, so why don't you just keep it?"
"Lisa's completely satisfied with this report, so..."
"Keep up the good work with your rifle. Make sure to torment lots and lots of hostiles before you kill them."
"You can now call Lisa as a partner."

"A new Client Order is available for Jozsef.

Jozsef can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
